messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] kgiuffre/Karen getting off the list, or anyone else
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the help dispite the sarcasm. I don t get to the bottom of the emails as I find them petty and self serving. And I must add truely disappointing. K
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the help dispite the sarcasm. I don't get to the bottom of the
emails as I find them petty and self serving. And I must add truely
disappointing. K
----- Original Message -----
From: <SandraDodd@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 07, 2003 12:33 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] kgiuffre/Karen getting off the list, or anyone
else


> At the bottom of every single e-mail there are instructions for getting
off
> the list, which means that will appear at the bottom of this e-mail, and
was
> at the bottom of the e-mail saying "help me get off the list."
>
>
> Sandra
>
